name: WP Footer Menu
author: Graeme Boy

sections.description: WP Footer Menu is a very simple plugin that adds a settings page to wp-admin, which allows you to customize a footer menu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the WP Footer Menu directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the options page under “Settings” to make changes.
sections.faq:
How do I contact you?

Email graemeboy@gmail.com

Is this plugin free?

Yes.
sections.changelog:
2.0

Added some more customization features.

1.0

The initial version of this plugin.
